channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wear
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wear

item.title: CVE-2016-10443|2024-08-06T03:21:51.707Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, packet replay may be possible.

item.title: CVE-2016-10469|2024-08-06T03:21:52.130Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, incorrect implementation of RSA padding functions in CORE.

item.title: CVE-2015-9166|2024-08-06T08:43:41.034Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear IPQ4019, MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, DRM provisioning mechanisms used in QSEE applications have a feature to prevent further provisioning. This is done by creating an SFS file called 'finalize_prov_flag.data' at the end of provisioning. When this feature is enabled, provisioning calls check for the existence of the file in order to decide whether to do provisioning or not. Current implementation allows provisioning without sufficient checks.

item.title: CVE-2015-9153|2024-08-06T08:43:41.101Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear IPQ4019, MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, in a DRM function, a buffer over-read can occur.

item.title: CVE-2015-9149|2024-08-06T08:43:42.621Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, in a DIAG ioctl handler, an untrusted pointer dereference can occur.

item.title: CVE-2015-9188|2024-08-06T08:43:41.623Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 600, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, in Secure DEMUX command handler, when parameter validation fails, an error code is written into a response buffer without checking that response buffer length, passed from HLOS, which may result in memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2015-9160|2024-08-06T08:43:41.021Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9635M, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, integer overflow may occur when values passed from HLOS (graphics driver busy time, and total time) in TZBSP_GFX_DCVS_UPDATE_ID are very large.

item.title: CVE-2015-9198|2024-08-06T08:43:41.629Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear IPQ4019, MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9625, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, SD 850, and SDX20, integer underflow vulnerability in function qsee_register_log_buff may lead to arbitrary writing of secure memory.

item.title: CVE-2015-9172|2024-08-06T08:43:40.982Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, in a WideVine API function, a buffer over-read can occur.

item.title: CVE-2015-9176|2024-08-06T08:43:41.020Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, Input_address is registered as a shared buffer and is not properly checked before use in OEMCrypto_Generic_Sign(). This allows addresses to be accessed that reside in secure/CP memory.

item.title: CVE-2016-10444|2024-08-06T03:21:51.633Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 625, SD 820, SD 820A, and SD 835, SMMU Access Control Policy was updated to block HLOS from accessing BLSP and BAM resources.

item.title: CVE-2015-9193|2024-08-06T08:43:41.160Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, improper input validation could cause a memory overread and cause the app to crash.

item.title: CVE-2016-10474|2024-08-06T03:21:52.128Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear IPQ4019, MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, if the buffer length passed to the RIL interface is too large, the buffer size calculation may overflow, resulting in an undersize allocation for the buffer, and subsequently buffer overwrite.

item.title: CVE-2015-9186|2024-08-06T08:43:41.615Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, in a PlayReady API function, a buffer over-read can occur.

item.title: CVE-2016-10484|2024-08-06T03:21:52.082Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear IPQ4019, MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9625, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, and SDX20, if a RPMB listener is registered with a very small buffer size, the calculation of the maximum transfer size for read and write operations may underflow, resulting in buffer overflow.

item.title: CVE-2015-9175|2024-08-06T08:43:41.485Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, lack of input validation could lead to an untrusted pointer dereference in wv_dash_core_generic_verify().

item.title: CVE-2015-9120|2024-08-06T08:36:31.931Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear IPQ4019, MDM9206, MDM9607, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 600, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, and SD 835, detection of Error Condition Without Action in Core.

item.title: CVE-2016-10494|2024-08-06T03:21:52.136Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9625, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, SD 850, and SDX20, integer overflow may lead to buffer overflows in IPC router Root-PD driver.

item.title: CVE-2015-9182|2024-08-06T08:43:41.636Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, lack of input validation in OEMCrypto_GenerateSignature() can cause buffer over read.

item.title: CVE-2015-9185|2024-08-06T08:43:41.519Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 600, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, in multiple Secure DEMUX functions (e.g., SDMX_open_session, SDMX_close_session, SDMX_set_session_cfg), when parameter validation fails, an error code is written into a response buffer, without checking that response buffer length (rsplen) passed from HLOS is large enough to hold the response. If the buffer is at the end of a non-secure page followed by secured memory page, this can cause a secure memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2015-9181|2024-08-06T08:43:41.022Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, and SD 835, in a crypto API function, a buffer over-read can occur.

item.title: CVE-2015-9187|2024-08-06T08:43:41.484Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, lack of buffer length validation in pvr_cmd_handler leads to unauthorized access to secure memory.

item.title: CVE-2016-10417|2024-08-06T03:21:51.444Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear IPQ4019, MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9625, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, and SDX20, in QTEE, a TOCTOU vulnerability exists due to improper access control.

item.title: CVE-2015-9211|2024-08-06T08:43:41.529Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, while provising the Playready module, a buffer overread may occur if the message passed is large.

item.title: CVE-2015-9164|2024-08-06T08:43:41.176Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, and SD 820A, a buffer overread in Playready may occur due to lack of input validation of the buffer size provided by HLOS.

item.title: CVE-2015-9128|2024-08-06T08:36:31.926Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, and SD 835, lack of validation of the buffer size could lead to a buffer overread.

item.title: CVE-2016-10433|2024-08-06T03:21:51.516Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 820, and SD 820A, TOCTOU vulnerability during SSD image decryption may cause memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2016-10425|2024-08-06T03:21:51.692Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, and SD 835, if GPT listener response is passed a large buffer offset, a buffer overflow occurs.

item.title: CVE-2015-9192|2024-08-06T08:43:41.572Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, out of bounds memory access vulnerability may occur in the content protection manager due to improper validation of incoming messages.

item.title: CVE-2015-9170|2024-08-06T08:43:41.247Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, incorrect offset check in wv_dash_core_refresh_keys() may lead to a buffer overread.

item.title: CVE-2016-10446|2024-08-06T03:21:51.455Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 820, SD 820A, and SD 835, incorrect configuration of the OCIMEM MPU may provide NonSecure Software access to OCIMEM memory used by TZ.

item.title: CVE-2015-9202|2024-08-06T08:43:42.526Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, while processing the content headers in the Playready module, a buffer overread may occur if the header count exceeds the expected value.

item.title: CVE-2015-9158|2024-08-06T08:43:41.170Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, in a QTEE crypto function, a buffer overflow can occur.

item.title: CVE-2016-10487|2024-08-06T03:21:52.132Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, SD 850, and SDX20, in a QuRT API function, an untrusted pointer dereference can occur.

item.title: CVE-2016-10424|2024-08-06T03:21:51.636Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, upgrading LibPNG from 1.6.12 to 1.6.21 fixes multiple issues with different CWEs.

item.title: CVE-2015-9129|2024-08-06T08:36:31.669Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, if the size parameter passed to TZ_PR_CMD_CONTENT_SET_PROP is small, an integer underflow occurs.

item.title: CVE-2015-9159|2024-08-06T08:43:41.547Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, lack of input validation OEMCrypto_GetRandom can cause potential buffer overflow.

item.title: CVE-2016-10493|2024-08-06T03:21:52.144Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, SD 850, and SDX20, NPA routines on the rootPD that handle resource requests remoted over QDI may not validate pointers passed from user space which may result in guest OS memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2016-10418|2024-08-06T03:21:51.589Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 820, SD 820A, and SD 835, HLOS can enable PMIC debug through TCSR_QPDI_DISABLE_CFG due to improper access control.

item.title: CVE-2015-9177|2024-08-06T08:43:42.830Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, in a crypto API function, a buffer over-read can occur.

item.title: CVE-2015-9203|2024-08-06T08:43:41.649Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, lack of input validation in playready_set_domainid could lead to a buffer overread.

item.title: CVE-2015-9171|2024-08-06T08:43:41.104Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, if OEMCrypto_Dash_InstallEncapKeybox() is called with keyBoxLength set to a value higher than TZ_WV_MAX_DATA_LEN (20k), a buffer over-read occurs.

item.title: CVE-2015-9201|2024-08-06T08:43:41.548Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear IPQ4019, MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9625, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 600, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, and SDX20, integer overflow in tzbsp can lead to privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2015-9145|2024-08-06T08:43:40.977Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, SD 850, and SDX20, lack of input validation in NPA driver functions leads to null pointer dereference.

item.title: CVE-2015-9210|2024-08-06T08:43:41.638Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, lack of input validation in playready_licacq_process_response() can lead to memory over read.

item.title: CVE-2015-9184|2024-08-06T08:43:41.574Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, and SD 835, lack of length checking in wv_dash_core_load_keys_v8() could lead to a buffer overflow vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2015-9163|2024-08-06T08:43:41.152Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, in a PlayReady function, information exposure can occur.

item.title: CVE-2016-10431|2024-08-06T03:21:51.354Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, TZ applications are not properly validated.

item.title: CVE-2015-9180|2024-08-06T08:43:41.209Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 600, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, the response pointer passed from user space to SDMX_process is not checked before it is used. If the given response buffer length is smaller than 16 bytes, the response values will be written to a memory outside the buffer, possibly in the secure memory area.

item.title: CVE-2015-9178|2024-08-06T08:43:41.033Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, while processing the rmp secure command, memory corruption may result if the response buffer is smaller than the expected size.

item.title: CVE-2016-10435|2024-08-06T03:21:51.713Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9625, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 820, and SD 820A, in some QTEE syscall handlers, a TOCTOU vulnerability exists.
